subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: After 5 hours and 14 minutes, Fernando Verdasco was down on his knees in disappointment, and Rafael Nadal was flat on his back with delight after advancing to the Australian Open final.
snippet: After 5 hours and 14 minutes, Fernando Verdasco was down on his knees in disappointment, and Rafael Nadal was flat on his back with delight after advancing to the Australian Open final.
